summary:
Energetic, decisive, eager to learn, loyal, open, direct, realistic, goal-driven, pragmatic, entrepreneurial, social - just a few key words to describe me.

I see opportunities and challenges in everything, I have a broad knowledge of sales operations & customer service (B2B), and I love to do several things at the same time - boring does not exist with me. 

With my energy and enthusiasm I am naturally capable of motivating and coaching team members and other stakeholders to a higher level.

My drives/mission:
Optimize internal communication and operational processes, secure customer satisfaction, and improve internal & external efficiency.

To conclude: 
An all-round professional with an extensive experience in all aspects of sales operations management, customer service management & account management.

Specialties (B2B & Distributors):
* Sales Operations Management
* Customer Service Management
* Account Management (office sales)
* Improvement- & Efficiency projects
* Export

* ERP systems: SAP, Microsoft Dynamics Axapta, Microsoft Dynamics Navision, AS400
* CRM systems: Salesforce
* E-Commerce: Magento

* Multilingual: Fluent Dutch, English, German, French

profile_positions.description:
* Management of the Customer Service department (B2B) for our Benelux office with 3 direct reports (Teamleads) and 30 indirect reports (Front Office, Back Office, Technical Support & Operations)
* Responsible for the quantity and quality of the order entry executed by our Global Shared Business Service Center: a part of our offline orders is being processed in the service center at our head office in Corby, UK
* Maintain a high level of customer experience and operational excellence: a.o. responsible for follow up on the feedback received through our NPS surveys and make sure the required actions are being taken 
* Stimulate good communication and cooperation between the Customer Service teams and Sales teams
* Continuous Improvement (CI): aim for continuous improvement internally through our Lean and Six Sigma tools, in order to be able to improve our service and efficiency where needed
* Quality Management/ISO procedures: keeping our QMS up-to-date, execution of internal audits and reporting ISO-related topics to the Local Leadership Team.
* GDPR compliance: Responsible for continuously safeguarding our compliance with the GDPR regulations for the Benelux organization, coordination of training and communication on GDPR rules (refreshment courses, etc.), and take care of questions from employees with regard to any GDPR related topic 
* Business Development/Value Added Services: supporting the internal organization in executing projects with regard to new Value Added Services programs which support our customers in efficient purchase- and stock solutions (i.e. take part in or manage pilots for testing our new services)
* Business Change Manager for the implementation of CRM/Salesforce on behalf of Rest of EMEA region (Benelux, Eastern Europe, Emerging Markets, Scandinavia & South Africa)
* Projectmanager for the relocation of our local office
* MT member (Local Leadership Team)
profile_positions.title: Head of Customer Service Benelux

profile_positions.description:
* Manage the Customer Service & Operations department, which consists of 2 teams: Wholesale and E-commerce (in total 10 FTE)
* Operationally responsible for our Outlet store in Bataviastad (Lelystad)
* Operational account management of key accounts as Zalando, AS Adventure/Retail Concepts and our distributor in Australia
* Manage optimalisations of the Customer Service processes and -systems to improve the customer service and customer experience towards our wholesale partners, international agents and customers
* Recommend plans, solutions and strategies in order to manage & improve internal and external operational processes, increase efficiency and achieve an excellent customer experience
* Set up and manage gross-to-net cycle (order-to-cash cycle) and provide & analyse the required reports 
* Coordinate with Sales, Finance and Logistics to evaluate and develop internal operational processes and drive improvements
* Set up and analyse management information including relevant KPI’s 
* Responsible for organising Sample Sale twice per year
* MT-member
profile_positions.title: Manager Customer Service & Operations

profile_positions.description:
Bedrock Manufacturing Europe BV is a subsidiary of Bedrock Inc., which owns the Filson and Shinola brands, and also manages Tom Ford Timepieces under license.

* Manage the Operations department: Customer Service (B2B) & e-commerce, Sales Support, Logistics & Facility
* Manage 3rd party warehouse and logistics partner based in Rotterdam
* Manage external watch repair center in Oosterhout
* Coordinate with Sales, Finance and Planning to evaluate and develop operational processes and drive improvements
* Recommend plans, solutions and strategies in order to manage & improve internal and external operational processes, increase efficiency and achieve an excellent customer experience
* Manage gross-to-net cycle (order-to-cash cycle) and provide & analyse the required reports 
* Manage orders and shipments from USA to wholesale accounts and direct retail channels in Europe
* Account Management of customers in EMEA region, maintain a high customer service level, manage customer requirements, define SLA’s per channel, address customer concerns & complaints
* Manage monthly & weekly sales- and delivery reports
* MT-member
profile_positions.title: Operations & Logistics Manager

profile_positions.description:
* Recommend plans, solutions and strategies in order to manage & improve internal operational processes, increase efficiency and achieve an excellent customer experience
* Motivate, encourage and lead the Sales- and Back Office team, plus other stakeholders (like Marketing, Business Control, Credit Control, Logistics, Purchase, Commercial Conditions) to reach delivery targets and to succeed in in-time problem solving
* Account Management of customers (Distributors and Mono- & Multi brand partners) within Emerging Markets (Eastern-Europe, Africa, Latin-America, India, South-East Asia and the Middle-East), maintain a high customer service level, define SLA’s per channel, address customer concerns & complaints
* Improve cooperation with, and communication between, Emerging Markets and other internal departments
* Execute commercial opportunities and advise Sales & Management accordingly
* Manage gross-to-net cycle (order-to-cash cycle) and provide & analyse the required reports 
* Analyze and solve ad hoc and long-term bottlenecks in the entire operational process
* Operational teamlead for all Emerging Markets team members and other internal stakeholders
profile_positions.title: Sales Operations Manager - Emerging Markets

profile_positions.description: Customer Service takes care of the B2B customers worldwide. The Teamlead Customer Service manages the team of 8 Customer Service employees and Rail Designers working with their own group of customers in the UK, Germany, Switzerland, Austria and ‘Rest of the World’ (South and Eastern Europe, Scandinavia, Malaysia, Australia). Other responsibilities: trouble-shooting, complaint handling (both internal & external), operational process improvements, meeting deadlines & weekly targets, coordinating projects, stimulating good & close communication and cooperation with our international customers, and maintain an outstanding customer experience.
profile_positions.title: Teamlead Customer Service

profile_positions.description: Key-user on behalf of Customer Service regarding the implementation of Microsoft Dynamics AX and CRM.
profile_positions.title: Key-user ERP project (MS Dynamics AX & CRM)

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the entire after sales for own group of customers (B2B) in the UK, Germany, Switzerland, Austria and the Netherlands: create a positive customer experience at all times, process quotations/orders, production planning, handle complaints & complex questions, organise (urgent) deliveries, solve breakdowns, chase payments, office account management, attend international exhibitions, etc.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Coordinator

profile_positions.description: Secretary for 4 (international) Board members: CEO, CFO, COO & CMO
profile_positions.title: Executive Secretary

volunteer_experiences.description: For a period of 18 months on a weekly base: supporting and guiding a 13-year-old girl from Ghana who has moved to the Netherlands 3 years ago. Helping her further improve her Dutch language skills, helping her find the right high school, helping her with any personal challenges and supporting her in any other field where needed and where her teacher and family are not able to. Also doing some fun activities together, like playing sports, exploring the city by bike or visiting a museum from time to time.
